articles.title: Blood Moon 2022: 8 Weird Things You Need To Know About North America’s 84-Minute Total Lunar Eclipse This Weekend - Forbes
articles.description: It’s the longest prime-time totality this century for the western half of North America. It's also one of a pair of very unusual eclipses. Here's what else is odd about this Sunday's total lunar eclipse.
articles.content:
The Moon during the phases of a total lunar eclipse, which will occur on May 15-16, 2022 and be ... [+] visible from North America.
AFP via Getty Images

articles.title: Total 'blood moon' eclipse to rise over US this weekend - KABC-TV
articles.description: Just as the sun sets over North America on Sunday evening, the sun, Earth and moon will begin to align to create the "blood moon" total lunar eclipse.
articles.content: The moon will plunge into darkness this weekend to create a celestial spectacle that has not been seen in the sky over the entire contiguous United States since the turn of the decade.Just as the sun… [+4198 chars]
